name: Craft planks
goal: Craft wooden planks from logs, stems, wood blocks, or bamboo
required_items: 1 log OR 1 stem OR 1 wood block OR 1 block_of_bamboo
notes: Planks are the most fundamental crafting material. Each log/stem/wood block yields 4 planks. Each Block of Bamboo only yields 2 planks (half the normal rate). Planks can be crafted in the 2x2 player crafting grid — no crafting table needed. ALL the following block types produce planks: oak_log, spruce_log, birch_log, jungle_log, acacia_log, dark_oak_log, mangrove_log, cherry_log, pale_oak_log (yields respective plank type), crimson_stem and warped_stem (yields crimson/warped planks — Nether wood types that don't burn), stripped versions of all logs/stems also work, wood blocks (oak_wood, spruce_wood, etc.) also work, and block_of_bamboo yields bamboo_planks.

steps.title: Obtain logs or stems
steps.details: Chop trees to get logs. Any tree type works: oak, spruce, birch, jungle, acacia, dark oak, mangrove, cherry, pale oak. In the Nether, break crimson or warped stems from huge fungi. Each log/stem/wood gives 4 planks. If using bamboo, craft 9 bamboo into 1 Block of Bamboo first (yields only 2 planks per block). See 'Gather wood' recipe for all ways to obtain logs.
checks: Have at least 1 log, stem, wood block, or block_of_bamboo in inventory

steps.title: Craft planks
steps.details: Place 1 log (or stem, or wood block) anywhere in the crafting grid to get 4 planks. No crafting table required — works in the 2x2 player grid. Recipe: { "recipe": "<type>_planks", "count": 4 } where <type> matches your wood type. For bamboo: place 1 block_of_bamboo to get 2 bamboo_planks. You can mix wood types for sticks/fuel but NOT for recipes that require matching types (doors, signs, boats).
checks: Note: different wood type planks do NOT stack together
